subject: You must be lucky for this Carla
body:
Dear Carla
Thanks for your message and wise question and I'll put my message in a way
you will understand it. You see, in the year 2010 a total sum of $32.5M USD
was deposited with our bank by the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and on
October 3rd last year the funds were moved to the World Bank with the
instructions of the United Nation. And after the meeting held recently
concerning the accrued interest it was agreed that the interest should be
paid to you as a compensation for being scammed some time ago. So we
contacted you based on the instruction we received from World Bank and you
are to claim the funds via bank to bank wire transfer or we shall credit
the funds in ATM CARD and dispatch to your address. Although, this will
warrant you to visit our bank for signing the necessary documents
concerning the aforementioned funds before we can make the payment. I
believe you can now understand the outcome of the funds and I must say you
are very lucky to be remembered for this. Though, it happens often but not
to this huge amount of $975,000.
Thanks for your understanding and do enjoy your weekend.
Regards
Paul

subject: Why The Sudden Silent Carla?
body:
Dear Carla
Thanks for your message and wise question and I'll put my message in a way
you will understand it. You see, in the year 2010 a total sum of $32.5M USD
was deposited with our bank by the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and on
October 3rd last year the funds were moved to the World Bank with the
instructions of the United Nation. And after the meeting held recently
concerning the accrued interest it was agreed that the interest should be
paid to you as a compensation for being scammed some time ago. So we
contacted you based on the instruction we received from World Bank and you
are to claim the funds via bank to bank wire transfer or we shall credit
the funds in ATM CARD and dispatch to your address. Although, this will
warrant you to visit our bank for signing the necessary documents
concerning the aforementioned funds before we can make the payment. I
believe you can now understand the outcome of the funds and I must say you
are very lucky to be remembered for this. Though, it happens often but not
to this huge amount of $975,000.
Thanks for your understanding and do enjoy your weekend.
Regards
Paul
